channel.title: Posts on tohjustin's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on tohjustin's blog

item.title: Publishing Krew plugin manifests with GoReleaser
item.description: GoReleaser v1.0.0 was just released this week & I wanted to try out their new Krew integration to see if I can use it in my GitHub Actions workflow to publish new versions of my kubectl plugins to the official krew index.

item.title: kube-lineage: A CLI tool for visualizing Kubernetes object relationships
item.description: kube-lineage is a CLI tool for visualizing Kubernetes object relationships. It allows users to view all dependents or dependencies of a given Kubernetes object so that they can better understand how objects in a cluster are related to each other.
